scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV=development && rimraf dev-dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW_DEV=true vite --force --port 3006
scripts.dev-claims: rimraf dev-dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW_DEV=true CLAIMS=true SW=true vite --force
scripts.dev-destroy: rimraf dev-dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW_DESTROY=true SW_DEV=true vite --force
scripts.dev-claims-destroy: rimraf dev-dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW_DESTROY=true SW_DEV=true CLAIMS=true SW=true vite --force
scripts.start: npm run run-build && npm run serve
scripts.start-reloadsw: npm run run-build-reloadsw && npm run serve
scripts.start-claims: npm run run-build-claims && npm run serve
scripts.start-claims-reloadsw: npm run run-build-reloadsw-claims && npm run serve
scripts.start-sw: npm run run-build-sw && npm run serve
scripts.start-sw-reloadsw: npm run run-build-sw-reloadsw && npm run serve
scripts.start-sw-claims: npm run run-build-sw-claims && npm run serve
scripts.start-sw-claims-reloadsw: npm run run-build-sw-claims-reloadsw && npm run serve
scripts.build: export NODE_ENV==production && rimraf dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW_DEV=false CLAIMS=true RELOAD_SW=true SW=true BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true vite build
scripts.run-build: rimraf dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true vite build
scripts.run-build-reloadsw: rimraf dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true RELOAD_SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-claims: rimraf dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true CLAIMS=true vite build
scripts.run-build-reloadsw-claims: rimraf dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true CLAIMS=true RELOAD_SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-sw: rimraf dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-sw-reloadsw: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true RELOAD_SW=true SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-sw-claims: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true CLAIMS=true SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-sw-claims-reloadsw: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true CLAIMS=true RELOAD_SW=true SW=true vite build
scripts.start-destroy: npm run run-build-destroy && npm run serve
scripts.start-reloadsw-destroy: npm run run-build-reloadsw-destroy && npm run serve
scripts.start-claims-destroy: npm run run-build-claims-destroy && npm run serve
scripts.start-claims-reloadsw-destroy: npm run run-build-reloadsw-claims-destroy && npm run serve
scripts.start-sw-destroy: npm run run-build-sw-destroy && npm run serve
scripts.start-sw-reloadsw-destroy: npm run run-build-sw-reloadsw-destroy && npm run serve
scripts.start-sw-claims-destroy: npm run run-build-sw-claims-destroy && npm run serve
scripts.start-sw-claims-reloadsw-destroy: npm run run-build-sw-reloadsw-claims-destroy && npm run serve
scripts.run-build-destroy: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW_DESTROY=true vite build
scripts.run-build-reloadsw-destroy: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW_DESTROY=true RELOAD_SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-claims-destroy: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW_DESTROY=true CLAIMS=true vite build
scripts.run-build-reloadsw-claims-destroy: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW_DESTROY=true CLAIMS=true RELOAD_SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-sw-destroy: rimraf dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW_DESTROY=true SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-sw-reloadsw-destroy: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW_DESTROY=true RELOAD_SW=true SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-sw-claims-destroy: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW_DESTROY=true CLAIMS=true SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-sw-reloadsw-claims-destroy: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW_DESTROY=true CLAIMS=true RELOAD_SW=true SW=true vite build
scripts.preview: export PORT=3006 && export NODE_ENV==production && vite preview --port 3006
scripts.prod: export PORT=3006 && export NODE_ENV=production && sirv dist --cors --single --port 3006 --http2 --cert ./cert/fullchain.pem --key ./cert/privkey.pem
